title: willi9974
author: willi9974
created_time: December 19, 2022, 12:43:00 PMLast edit: December 24, 2022, 11:24:22 AM by willi9974
content: Get a free Willi's stainless 24 word recovery seed plate (on the backside you have the same matrix for seed word 13 to 24)More details about the seed plate --> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5323755.0And Bulletproof from Jameson Lopp --> https://jlopp.github.io/metal-bitcoin-storage-reviews/reviews/willi-recovery-seed-plate/This RAFFLE is also to support the annual "Bitcointalk Community Awards" event where Betnomi was invited to be a sponsor! Good luck!I will announce the block number when we are full.Your forum account must be registered no later than September 1 of the current year and must have minimum of 50 postings.We may, at our discretion, ignore applies (including inactive posters, etc).How this will work:Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)Can take two slots if you voted in the topic Bitcointalk Community Awards üèÜAfter I choose a block, the last symbol of the hash will determine the winner.Shipping in Germany is includet and shipping out auf germany has to cover the winner (beware, may cost $10-$20 or more)More informations to my seed plate or other productshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5323755.0 --> Stainless steel Bitcoin Recovery Seed Platehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5382457.0 --> 40mm x 3mm 30g Bitcoin Coin (loadable and customizable coin)https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5402602.0 --> Stainless steel pinboard magnetshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5319574.0 --> Dark stainless Bitcoin or Ethereum secure cold wallet (BIP38 encrypted)00 -
